              English  
            
            
            My name is Beatriz, and my pronoum is she/her. I‚Äôm currently a doctorate student in Environmental Science (PROCAM/IEE/USP) at the University of S√£o Paulo. I‚Äôm a researcher at the FAPESP Thematic Project MacroAmb - Environmental Governance of the Sao Paulo Macrometropolis in the context of climatic variability. I am voluntarily part of the Executive Secretariat team of the Journal Ambiente & Sociedade, a Brazilian scientific journal that is a reference in interdisciplinary studies on environment and society.
            I am a co-organizer of R-Ladies S√£o Paulo, a community that aims to promote gender diversity in the R community.
            I am an instructor at Carpentries, a project whose mission is to teach data science skills to researchers. I‚Äôm also a tidyverse certified instructor by RStudio.
            Since April 2020, I‚Äôm part of the team of Ambassadors for Civic Innovation of Open Knowledge Brasil.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Beatriz Milz

              My name is Beatriz, and my pronoum is she/her. I‚Äôm currently a doctorate student in Environmental Science (PROCAM/IEE/USP) at the University of S√£o Paulo. I‚Äôm a researcher at the FAPESP Thematic Project MacroAmb - Environmental Governance of the Sao Paulo Macrometropolis in the context of climatic variability. I am voluntarily part of the Executive Secretariat team of the Journal Ambiente & Sociedade, a Brazilian scientific journal that is a reference in interdisciplinary studies on environment and society.
              I am a co-organizer of R-Ladies S√£o Paulo, a community that aims to promote gender diversity in the R community.
              I am an instructor at Carpentries, a project whose mission is to teach data science skills to researchers. I‚Äôm also a tidyverse certified instructor by RStudio.
              Since April 2020, I‚Äôm part of the team of Ambassadors for Civic Innovation of Open Knowledge Brasil.
            
        
      
    

    
    
    
      




      Beatriz Milz - 2021.

            Mi nombre es Beatriz y mi pronombre es ella. Actualmente soy estudiante de doctorado en Ciencias Ambientales (PROCAM/IEE/ USP) en la Universidad de S√£o Paulo. Soy investigadora en el Proyecto Tem√°tico FAPESP MacroAmb - Gobernanza Ambiental de la Macrometr√≥pole Paulista debido a la variabilidad clim√°tica. Soy voluntariamente parte del equipo de la Secretar√≠a Ejecutiva de Revista Ambiente & Sociedade, una revista cient√≠fica brasile√±a que es una referencia en estudios interdisciplinarios sobre medio ambiente y sociedad.
            Soy coorganizadora de R-Ladies S√£o Paulo, una comunidad que tiene como objetivo promover la diversidad de g√©nero en la comunidad de programaci√≥n R.
            Soy instructora en Carpentries, un proyecto cuya misi√≥n es ense√±ar habilidades de ciencia de datos para investigadores acad√©micos. Tambi√©n soy una instructora certificada tidyverse por RStudio.
            Desde abril de 2020, formo parte del equipo de personas Embajadoras para la Inovaci√≥n C√≠vica de Open Knowledge Brasil.

Soy investigadora en el Proyecto Tem√°tico FAPESP MacroAmb - Gobernanza Ambiental de la Macrometr√≥pole Paulista debido a la variabilidad clim√°tica. Soy voluntariamente parte del equipo de la Secretar√≠a Ejecutiva de Revista Ambiente & Sociedade, una revista cient√≠fica brasile√±a que es una referencia en estudios interdisciplinarios sobre medio ambiente y sociedad.
              Soy coorganizadora de R-Ladies S√£o Paulo, una comunidad que tiene como objetivo promover la diversidad de g√©nero en la comunidad de programaci√≥n R.
              Soy instructora en Carpentries, un proyecto cuya misi√≥n es ense√±ar habilidades de ciencia de datos para investigadores acad√©micos. Tambi√©n soy una instructora certificada tidyverse por RStudio.

articles.title: Como esse site foi feito?
articles.contents:
Nesta p√°gina est√£o descritas os softwares, pacotes e ferramentas que utilizei para a cria√ß√£o deste site.
Linguagem de programa√ß√£o R R Core Team (2021).
Ambiente de desenvolvimento (IDE) RStudio.
Pacotes R Markdown (Allaire, Xie, et al. 2021; Xie, Allaire, and Grolemund 2018) e knitr (Xie 2014, 2015, 2021).
O pacote distill Allaire, Iannone, et al. (2021) foi utilizado para criar a estrutura do site.
As apresenta√ß√µes foram criadas com os pacotes: xaringan (R-xaringan?), xaringanthemer (R-xaringanthemer?), xaringanExtra Aden-Buie and Warkentin (2021) e countdown (R-countdown?).
O pacote metathis Aden-Buie (2020) foi utilizado para cria√ß√£o das tags <meta> (de HTML).
Os √≠cones s√£o dos sites Font Awesome e Academicons.
O versionamento do c√≥digo e o deploy do site √© realizado atrav√©s deste reposit√≥rio no GitHub.
ü¶ú Termos do Gloss√°rio foram adicionados atrav√©s do pacote glosario (R-glosario?).
Emojis adicionados com os pacotes emo Wickham, Fran√ßois, and D‚ÄôAgostino McGowan (2021) e ermoji (R-ermoji?).
üë©‚Äçüíª + üíú+ ‚òï+ üéß & üéµ !






Aden-Buie, Garrick. 2020. Metathis: HTML Metadata Tags for r Markdown and Shiny. https://github.com/gadenbuie/metathis.


Aden-Buie, Garrick, and Matthew T. Warkentin. 2021. xaringanExtra: Extras and Extensions for Xaringan Slides. https://github.com/gadenbuie/xaringanExtra.


Allaire, JJ, Rich Iannone, Alison Presmanes Hill, and Yihui Xie. 2021. Distill: R Markdown Format for Scientific and Technical Writing.


Allaire, JJ, Yihui Xie, Jonathan McPherson, Javier Luraschi, Kevin Ushey, Aron Atkins, Hadley Wickham, Joe Cheng, Winston Chang, and Richard Iannone. 2021. Rmarkdown: Dynamic Documents for r.


R Core Team. 2021. R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing. Vienna, Austria: R Foundation for Statistical Computing. https://www.R-project.org/.


Wickham, Hadley, Romain Fran√ßois, and Lucy D‚ÄôAgostino McGowan. 2021. Emo: Easily Insert Emoji. https://github.com/hadley/emo.


Xie, Yihui. 2014. ‚ÄúKnitr: A Comprehensive Tool for Reproducible Research in R.‚Äù In Implementing Reproducible Computational Research, edited by Victoria Stodden, Friedrich Leisch, and Roger D. Peng. Chapman; Hall/CRC. http://www.crcpress.com/product/isbn/9781466561595.


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî. 2015. Dynamic Documents with R and Knitr. 2nd ed. Boca Raton, Florida: Chapman; Hall/CRC. https://yihui.org/knitr/.


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî. 2021. Knitr: A General-Purpose Package for Dynamic Report Generation in r. https://yihui.org/knitr/.


Xie, Yihui, J. J. Allaire, and Garrett Grolemund. 2018. R Markdown: The Definitive Guide. Boca Raton, Florida: Chapman; Hall/CRC. https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown.
